GSD.product_version: versions from v4.5 to before v4.19.238
GSD.description:
drbd: Fix five use after free bugs in get_initial_state

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 188fe6b26765edbad4055611c0f788b6870f4024, it was introduced in version v4.5 by commit a29728463b254ce81ecefdf20c1a02e01d9361da. For more details please see the references link.
